General.Name: Hangzhou Yitong New Material Co. LTD
General.Description: Hangzhou Yitong New Material Co., LTD manufactures iron based powder products in China and internationally. The company produces the water atomized iron, alloy steel, free cutting steel, stainless steel, sintered hardening, diamond matrix, magnetic series, and ultrafine iron, as well as copper-based alloy powders. Its products are used in automobile, motorcycle, household appliances, electric tools, construction machinery, instrumentation, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Jiande Yitong Metal Powder Co.,Ltd. Hangzhou Yitong New Material Co., LTD was founded in 2000 and is based in Jiande City, China.
